title: Game disconnecting
body: Recently for some reason at the the start of games once or twice I would just get kicked out and disconnected from the game. I'm not getting an error message and I can reconnect to the game just fine so I don't think it is a problem with my connection. Afterwards as well I would have now further problems during the game.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having trouble maintaining a connection after it's been established.  Our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide will offer some steps to help get this fixed for good.  Hopefully, you'll be able to stay connected without getting kicked off!
